5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abdullah bin Muhammad bin Rumh] berkata, telah memberitakan kepada kami [Ibnu Wahb] dari [Iyadl bin Abdullah] dari [Makhramah bin Sulaiman] dari [Kuraib] mantan pelayan Ibnu Abbas, dari [Ummu Hani` binti Abu Thalib] berkata, "Pada pembukaan kota Makkah Rasulullah shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam shalat sunnah Dluha delapan raka'at, kemudian beliau salam pada setiap dua raka'at

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning (voluntary) Prayers at night and during the day are two by two
